DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Japan . The aim trial investigate efficacy insulin detemir blood glucose control type 2 diabetes add current OHA treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Insulin Detemir Type 2 Diabetes Inadequately Controlled OHA Therapy Alone
DOC.criteria: Duration type 2 diabetes mellitus least one year Insulin naive patient OHA treatment least 12 week HbA1C 7.510.0 % Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 30.0 kg/m2 Impaired renal function Impaired hepatic function Pregnant , breastfeeding ( within year delivery ) , intention become pregnant use adequate contraceptive method
